00024 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00025 // Function: SystemColumnAddCommand()
00026 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00027 SystemColumnAddCommand::SystemColumnAddCommand(SystemColumnLayout* layout, QString const& name,
00028                                                QUndoCommand* parent) : QUndoCommand(parent), layout_(layout),
00029                                                                        name_(name), column_(0), del_(false)
00030 {
00031 }
00032 
00033 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00034 // Function: ~SystemColumnAddCommand()
00035 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036 SystemColumnAddCommand::~SystemColumnAddCommand()
00037 {
00038     if (del_)
00039     {
00040         delete column_;
00041     }
00042 }
00043 
00044 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 // Function: undo()
00046 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 void SystemColumnAddCommand::undo()
00048 {
00049     Q_ASSERT(column_ != 0);
00050 
00051     // Remove the column from the layout.
00052     layout_->removeColumn(column_);
00053     del_ = true;
00054 }
00055 
00056 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00057 // Function: redo()
00058 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00059 void SystemColumnAddCommand::redo()
00060 {
00061     // If this is the first time, create the column.
00062     if (column_ == 0)
00063     {
00064         layout_->addColumn(name_);
00065         column_ = layout_->getColumns().back();
00066     }
00067     else
00068     {
00069         // Otherwise add the existing column to the layout.
00070         layout_->addColumn(column_);
00071     }
00072 
00073     del_ = false;
00074 }

00081                                                                                    conn_(conn), scene_(scene),

00085 }

00087 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00088 // Function: ~EndpointConnectionAddCommand()
00089 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00090 EndpointConnectionAddCommand::~EndpointConnectionAddCommand()
00091 {
00092     if (del_)
00093     {
00094         delete conn_;
00095     }
00096 }
00097 
00098 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00099 // Function: undo()
00100 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00101 void EndpointConnectionAddCommand::undo()
00102 {
00103     // Remove the interconnection from the scene.
00104     scene_->removeItem(conn_);
00105 
00106     // Disconnect the ends.
00107     conn_->disconnectEnds();
00108     del_ = true;
00109 }
00110 
00111 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00112 // Function: redo()
00113 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00114 void EndpointConnectionAddCommand::redo()
00115 {
00116     // Add the back to the scene.
00117     if (!scene_->items().contains(conn_))
00118     {
00119         scene_->addItem(conn_);
00120     }
00121 
00122     // Connect the ends and set the interface modes and port map for the hierarchical end point.
00123     conn_->connectEnds();
00124     del_ = false;
00125 }

00147 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00148 // Function: undo()
00149 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00150 void PlatformCompAddCommand::undo()
00151 {
00152     Q_ASSERT(mappingComp_ != 0);
00153 
00154     // Remove the platform item from the mapping component and scene.
00155     mappingComp_->setPlatformComponent(0);
00156     mappingComp_->scene()->removeItem(item_);
00157     del_ = true;
00158 
00159     emit componentInstanceRemoved(item_);
00160 }
00161 
00162 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00163 // Function: redo()
00164 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00165 void PlatformCompAddCommand::redo()
00166 {
00167     Q_ASSERT(mappingComp_ != 0);
00168 
00169     mappingComp_->setPlatformComponent(item_);
00170     del_ = false;
00171 
00172     emit componentInstantiated(item_);
00173 }

00336 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00337 // Function: undo()
00338 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00339 void EndpointAddCommand::undo()
00340 {
00341     Q_ASSERT(stack_ != 0);
00342 
00343     // Remove the endpoint from the stack and the scene.
00344     stack_->removeEndpoint(item_);
00345     stack_->scene()->removeItem(item_);
00346     del_ = true;
00347 }
00348

00350 // Function: redo()
00351 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00352 void EndpointAddCommand::redo()
00353 {

00355 
00356     stack_->addEndpoint(item_);
00357     del_ = false;
00358 }
